name: Porta da Vila Apartments

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have recently returned from Porta Da Vila where I stayed with my husband in a Studio Apartment. The bathroom was in desperate need of updating most of the tiles on the walls were cracked and we had mould on the ceiling for the duration of our holiday.
reviews.title: Studios Need Updating

reviews.text: Spent a week in the Porta Da Vila ,Lagos Portugal in August 2008. The apartments were as decribed on the website. Located just inside the old walled town , in fact the wall at the end of the pool area ,is the part of the ancient town walls.
reviews.title: Modern apartments well positioned

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was clean and modern , with an excellent view over the swiming pool and beyond to the marina and beach area. The pool area was small and not suitable for children, but clean , with a small bar area.
reviews.title: Overall... great!

likes.disliked: — the FREEZING cold pool and the VERY sporadic room service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The apartments were well positioned ,with both beaches and restaurants within easy walking distance.
reviews.title: Fantastic! Nothing else to say!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Lagos town itself is a beautiful place , with steet entertainment in the evenings and an abundance of good restaurants to satisfy all requirements.
reviews.title: A perfect holiday.

likes.liked: — Quiet, Clean and Friendly. Excellent location in the REAL Lagos!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hello, we have just returned from Porta De Villa Appartments, having stayed two full weeks there. Everything that previous reviewers have said, is totally true, but we would like to add a couple of comments.
reviews.title: Excellent holiday - Hotel ticked all boxes!

likes.liked: — Fantastic Rooms, Attentive Staff, Hotel Cleanliness, Chilled out Atmosphere

reviews.text: Fantastic location with views overlooking the beaches, just what we were looking for.... within the historic town walls and strolling distance to the beautiful restaurants, shops and beaches.....
reviews.title: perfect

likes.liked: — The size of the apartment and the large roof terraced overlooking the beach

reviews.text: The staff were friendly and me and my sisters will definitely be coming again!
reviews.title: Ideal base for a relaxing week away

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed at the apartments with two friends (we're all in our twenties) and overall we thought the apartments were lovely. The main good points were:
reviews.title: Well located & Quiet

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: - big apartments with lots more space than average european apartments
reviews.title: Hidden Gem.

likes.liked: — The relaxed atmosphere of the pool area.

reviews.title: Third time and will go again

likes.liked: — Privacy and location in Old Town

aka: Porta Da Vila Apartments Hotel Lagos
